name: The Secret Ingredient (Ginger Jam): Ginger Sesame Noodles
description: My secret ingredient in this version of sesame noodles is ginger jam, a thick spread made from spicy ginger and sugar, that gives a sweet heat to the sauce, an Asian back-of-the-throat kick of ginger, and even more thickness.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the noodles in a large pot of boiling salted water according to package directions. Drain, and rinse with cold water.
Meanwhile, whisk together all the other ingredients into a smooth sauce. Gently toss the noodles with the sauce, and serve.
